Original: That one is from the Outland Count,
whom you know. He wants you to find a
glowing tree... Is there such a thing?
[Page]
Well, you can ask the Count himself
for the details at the Grand Court.
I shall await your swift return.
Translation: That one is from the Outland Count,
whom you know. He wants you to find a
glowing tree... Is there such a thing?
[Page]
Well, you can ask the Count himself
for the details at the Grand Court.
I shall await your swift return.

Original: I heard about your outing. That tonic
made from the shining slime mold will
be available for free at the clinic.
[Page]
The Count truly puts his city first.
Not many governors are as benevolent
as he is...
[Page]
He is quite exceptional. So many heads
of state oppress their people and
take advantage of them...
[Page]
But when he brings a request for the
explorers to this establishment, it
is with our interests at heart.
[Page]
To that, I think he would say, "That
is the duty of the one who holds the
power and purse strings, my friends."
Translation: I heard about your outing. That tonic
made from the shining slime mold will
be available for free at the clinic.
[Page]
The Count truly puts his city first.
Not many governors are as benevolent
as he is...
[Page]
He is quite exceptional. So many heads
of state oppress their people and
take advantage of them...
[Page]
But when he brings a request for the
explorers to this establishment, it
is with our interests at heart.
[Page]
To that, I think he would say, "That
is the duty of the one who holds the
power and purse strings, my friends."

Original: I've been waiting for you, my friends.
So you were the ones who took the
request... I had a feeling you would.
[Page]
Now then, about this [Color:5]glowing tree[Color:0]. The
rumor among you explorers is that it's
been seen in the [Color:5]Scarlet Pillars[Color:0].
[Page]
Though I'm reasonably confident that
the true reason for the glow is a
shining slime mold.
[Page]
It attaches itself to the tree and
gives off a natural [Color:5]white light[Color:0]. I
wonder if it has any medicinal use...
[Page]
I want you to find that glowing tree.
Of course, we will collect and perform
research upon the mold.
[Page]
Reports say it is to the northwest on
first entering the Scarlet Pillars.
Now go forth, for Tharsis!
Translation: I've been waiting for you, my friends.
So you were the ones who took the
request... I had a feeling you would.
[Page]
Now then, about this [Color:5]glowing tree[Color:0]. The
rumor among you explorers is that it's
been seen in the [Color:5]Scarlet Pillars[Color:0].
[Page]
Though I'm reasonably confident that
the true reason for the glow is a
shining slime mold.
[Page]
It attaches itself to the tree and
gives off a natural [Color:5]white light[Color:0]. I
wonder if it has any medicinal use...
[Page]
I want you to find that glowing tree.
Of course, we will collect and perform
research upon the mold.
[Page]
Reports say it is to the northwest on
first entering the Scarlet Pillars.
Now go forth, for Tharsis!

Original: Ah, hello, my friends! And what of
the glowing tree? Did you find the
shining slime mold?
Translation: Ah, hello, my friends! And what of
the glowing tree? Did you find the
shining slime mold?

Original: [Color:5]Did you find it?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information
Translation: [Color:5]Did you find it?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information

Original: Most people have trouble saying "no"
to me. But you always give me the
truth, and I appreciate that.
[Page]
Though it is not the answer I had
hoped for, you understand.
Translation: Most people have trouble saying "no"
to me. But you always give me the
truth, and I appreciate that.
[Page]
Though it is not the answer I had
hoped for, you understand.

Original: Our eyewitnesses say it's in the
northwest of the Scarlet Pillars.
Probably somewhere in the C-2 area.
[Page]
Once there... Hmm. When searching for
a [Color:5]glowing white tree[Color:0], you should go
when the glow is easiest to see.
Translation: Our eyewitnesses say it's in the
northwest of the Scarlet Pillars.
Probably somewhere in the C-2 area.
[Page]
Once there... Hmm. When searching for
a [Color:5]glowing white tree[Color:0], you should go
when the glow is easiest to see.

Original: Splendid, my friends! Please, point
out the location of this glowing tree
at once.
Translation: Splendid, my friends! Please, point
out the location of this glowing tree
at once.

Original: I see... Then that is where I will
send my scouts!
Translation: I see... Then that is where I will
send my scouts!

Original: I am sorry, my friends, but my scouts
have come back empty-handed. They saw
no glowing white tree there.
[Page]
Are you certain that the tree you
found was glowing [Color:5]white[Color:0]?
[Page]
There have been accounts, after all,
of slime mold glowing another color.
Be mindful of that in your search.
Translation: I am sorry, my friends, but my scouts
have come back empty-handed. They saw
no glowing white tree there.
[Page]
Are you certain that the tree you
found was glowing [Color:5]white[Color:0]?
[Page]
There have been accounts, after all,
of slime mold glowing another color.
Be mindful of that in your search.

Original: Splendid news, my friends! The scouts
did indeed find that shining slime
mold with the white glow!
[Page]
And sure enough, it's doing wonders
for medicine in Tharsis! I should form
a dedicated team to harvest it...
[Page]
Thank you once more for all of your
hard work. The reward is waiting for
you already at the Dancing Peacock!
Translation: Splendid news, my friends! The scouts
did indeed find that shining slime
mold with the white glow!
[Page]
And sure enough, it's doing wonders
for medicine in Tharsis! I should form
a dedicated team to harvest it...
[Page]
Thank you once more for all of your
hard work. The reward is waiting for
you already at the Dancing Peacock!

Original: As usual, every time I submit a
request for explorers, you discover
new possibilities.
[Page]
The only sore point is that I am sad
I cannot personally accompany you...
[Page]
I have money, and I have power...
But in the end, that is all I have.
Translation: As usual, every time I submit a
request for explorers, you discover
new possibilities.
[Page]
The only sore point is that I am sad
I cannot personally accompany you...
[Page]
I have money, and I have power...
But in the end, that is all I have.

Original: While searching the land under a
magnificent night sky, you look
below and see a faint light.
[Page]
Upon closer inspection, you see a
standing tree covered in an ethereal
[Color:5]white light[Color:0]!
Translation: While searching the land under a
magnificent night sky, you look
below and see a faint light.
[Page]
Upon closer inspection, you see a
standing tree covered in an ethereal
[Color:5]white light[Color:0]!

Original: You try and remember whether this is
the tree whose position you are meant
to mark and report to the Count...
Translation: You try and remember whether this is
the tree whose position you are meant
to mark and report to the Count...

Original: Though you are briefly fascinated by
the mysterious phenomenon, you take
your leave and continue your travels.
Translation: Though you are briefly fascinated by
the mysterious phenomenon, you take
your leave and continue your travels.

magnificent night sky, you look
below and see a faint light.
[Page]
Upon closer inspection, you see a
standing tree covered in a fierce
[Color:5]red light[Color:0]!
